resources.string:
AreYouOK is a simple personal alarm system that checks if you are OK every so often throughout the day.

If you don't respond it alerts your chosen friends and family by text message so that they can call or check in to make sure all is well.
(*Text messages charged at your standard rate, please check with your provider).
Alarm is set, next check-in at %1$s.
Check-in alarm is NOT set, please click \'Make Changes\' to set it.
I may be in need of help, please call or visit to check (sent by AreYouOK app http://areyouokapp.net)
I am OK, please disregard any previous message(s) (sent by AreYouOK app http://areyouokapp.net)

Great we\'re all set. The alarm is set to check in with you every %s %s after %s until %s, but not at those times.\n\nRemember you can change these settings, or disable the alarm at any time by opening the AreYouOK app.
